title: Sagittarius

nouns: A mark to indicate a direction or relation
A mark to indicate a direction or relation.
A sign or symbol used to indicate a direction (e.g. \to).
Someone with a Sagittarius star sign.
Someone with a Sagittarius star sign
Sagittarius is the ninth astrological sign, which is associated with the constellation Sagittarius.
A Zodiac sign corresponding to the constellation
A large zodiacal constellation in the southern hemisphere; between Scorpius and Capricornus
One of the twelve constellations of the zodiac.
Sagittarius is one of the constellations of the zodiac.

description: The Sagittarius astrological sign in the Zodiac. This Zodiac Symbol represents an Archer.
apple_vendor_description: The Sagittarius emoji on Apple devices embodies the zodiac sign with a bold, stylized centaur archer rendered in a deep, rich bronze. Apple's signature 3D shading creates a sense of muscularity and dynamism, while realistic lighting highlights the taut bowstring and the arrow poised for flight. Its smooth, rounded edges convey both power and grace, making it a perfect symbol for adventurous spirits, optimism, and freedom of expression in digital conversations.
